news_title: XRP Consolidates Under Trendline With Breakout Trigger in Sight
news_subtitle: XRP is currently in a consolidation phase, with its price trading under a descending trendline. Traders are eagerly awaiting a breakout, which could signal the next price direction. With over 500 million tokens locked in escrow, market conditions are set for potential volatility....

news_title: XRP ETFs Now Hold 1.12% of Supply, Stirring Market Liquidity Debate
news_subtitle: Key Insights XRP spot ETFs now manage $1.24 billion, locking up about 668 million XRP from active trading circulation. Institutional inflows continue, with a cumulative $1.17 billion and daily $5.58 million entering XRP ETF products. ETF-held XRP reduces market float, potentially...

news_title: Aave Founder Pledges Revenue Sharing After 55% Vote Opposes Community Control
news_subtitle: Aave Labs commits to revenue sharing with token holders after governance vote rejects community control.

news_title: XRP Pushes Above $2, Setting Up a Test of Upper Resistance
